channel.title: Script Involving a bit of Math
channel.description:
i play a game called conquer online and was interested if someone would be able to input a number (Current Experience and level ranging from 00.001 to 99.999 ) then based off this chart: (Experience balls per ball consumed) and price per ball and get an output so simplified (i hope lol) Input: Current Level 88-129 Current Xp (00.001-99.999) / Percent Each Ball Gives / and price per ball (normally in millions) Output: Cost to Level and Amount of Balls needed
Level %/Ball consumed 88: +92.627% 89: +78.652% 90: +74.709% 91: +73.473% 92: +72.100% 93: +63.843% 94: +54.916% 95: +51.497% 96: +50.664% 97: +49.332% 98: +45.145% 99: +38.838% 100: +36.838% 101: +36.232% 102: +32.967% 103: +25.987% 104: +22.360% 105: +20.979% 106: +20.685% 107: +19.732% 108: +18.330% 109: +13.006% 110: +6.162% 111: +5.541% 112: +5.463% 113: +5.369% 114: +5.279% 115: +5.243% 116: +5.191% 117: +5.107% 118: +4.339% 119: +3.511% 120: +8.925% 121: +7.438% 122: +6.198% 123: +5.165% 124: +4.304% 125: +3.587% 126: +2.989% 127: +2.490% 128: +2.346% 129: +2.346%
if i can elaborate more please let me know

item.title: Script Involving a bit of Math
item.dc:creator: @Moloch Moloch
item.description:
@Moloch wrote:

i play a game called conquer online and was interested if someone would be able to input a number (Current Experience and level ranging from 00.001 to 99.999 )
then based off this chart: (Experience balls per ball consumed) and price per ball and get an output
so simplified (i hope lol)
Input: Current Level 88-129 Current Xp (00.001-99.999) / Percent Each Ball Gives / and price per ball (normally in millions)
Output: Cost to Level and Amount of Balls needed
